entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
